text: hananimgwa naeseleul midji ani hamyeo hananimgwa seonjijaga geumgihan geos-eul jikiji anihago jinliui jong gyoleul ttaleuji anihan jadeul-ege bi log geudeul-i seongseoui baegseong-ila hadeo lado hangboghayeo induseleul jibulhal ttaekkaji seongjeonhala geudeul-eun seuseulo jeojuseuleoum-eul neukkilila
